title: [物理撚召喚]2條平行電子束一齊飛會點?

replies.msg:
2條平行電子束
以
同一速率飛行
好似咁

咁佢地之間應該會因為移動既電荷而產生磁場相吸
但又會因為相同電荷而相斥

咁結果會係吸埋一齊 , 相斥彈開, 定螺旋咁前進??

另一個問題, 如果觀察者係連登仔, 跑到同粒電子一樣速度

咁果時連登仔就會見倒2粒靜止既電子
結果應該因為相同電荷而相斥?
如果係咁, 靜止觀察者見倒既磁力又去左邊??

有冇高手可以解答下??

小畫家畫手,出post先見倒打錯左個斥字

Q1
靜電力係貢獻落radial component
磁力係貢獻落tangential component
兩者唔會couple一齊搞到好複雜，所以你只要將佢諗做相互排斥加螺旋加埋就得

Q2
磁力唔係守恆力，會響reference frame之下有唔同
更詳細要識相對論，太複雜唔講

replies.msg: magnetic force都係radial, magnetic field係 tangential
https://newt.phys.unsw.edu.au/einsteinlight/jw/module2_FEB.htm

Lorentz transformation of electromagnetic field
對於靜止觀測者，有電場，有磁場
對於，只有電場

咁果時連登仔就會見倒2粒靜止既電子

replies.msg:
喱個問題問得好好

咁有個最基本設定，係唔同觀察者觀察事件既情況下只可以有共同同意既事

啫係一係兩個觀察者都望到癡埋/分開

就喱點已經可以知係會癡埋，因為你右邊幅圖只會望到癡埋

而用數學計算，你會計到磁力遠遠細過電力（包含相對論）如果磁力要同電力力度有得比較，需要兩個粒子都到達光速/超越光速
入遲左黎

My friend Paul is a sci-fi fan. He did "If starships would exist, I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe." By the end of the next century, scientists will have invented starships. As I'm fascinated by the science of starships, I'm going to ask physics professor Dr. Chow about it. I'm gonna wait outside the lecture hall at twenty five of five. He'll have finished his lecture. I thought about signing him at five after twelve but my friend said "Don't phone him now. He won't have finished his lecture yet." It's true that he wouldn't have finished teaching yet. Last month, my friend Sarah was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After her trip, I said "If you should travel to Hokkaido again, can you get me a pack of White Lover Cookies please?" Sarah is a computer expert. Her cousin has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but he's having problems with his computer. If Sarah would go and fix his computer, he'll be so thankful for her help. He also has exams next Monday so he's better off revising at home over the weekend. Sarah's brother is a concierge in a hotel. I said "If it'll make you happy, I'll come to stay for two nights as company for you while your colleagues are away." Sarah is a kickboxing fan. Her favorite fighter Dan has won his retirement fight lately. He's deeply grateful to his coaches and thankful that he has got a job as a color commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans want to see Randy versus Fred. If Fred will sign a deal with the organization, Dana will make the fight happen. When Randy was reading the terms amd conditions of the contract, Dana's assistant said "If you would just sign here please." My friend Celine isn't very well-to-do while her boyfriend's family is very well-off. Last sunday, she threw a party at her place where cheap wines were served. The sofas in her flat are made of some cheap material. Her television is cheap and nasty. As some of is wanted to watch the news, I said "If I could turn on the TV please." She then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel."

replies.msg:
英文好長
就咁睇個結論好似係
未到光速就會彈開(磁力<<電力)
到左光速就會平行飛(磁力=電力)

但一諗如果有個光速觀察者
咪見倒2粒粒子好似唔帶電咁

quote.msg: https://newt.phys.unsw.edu.au/einsteinlight/jw/module2_FEB.htm

英文好長
就咁睇個結論好似係
未到光速就會彈開(磁力<<電力)
到左光速就會平行飛(磁力=電力)

但一諗如果有個光速觀察者
咪見倒2粒粒子好似唔帶電咁

replies.msg:
啱一半

首先無光速觀察者呢樣野，如果個pair粒子係光速咁一齊行，對於所有觀察者佢地都係光速

其次，所有已知帶電粒子都有質量，無可能去到光速，所以一定係排斥。然後當你係佢地個rest frame睇既話electric force就同普通唔郁既帶電粒子一樣，即係可以就咁用Coulomb’s law計

replies.msg:
當2粒野用0.999c 去飛
咁靜止觀察者見倒2粒野之間既力<純電力
而0.999c觀察者見倒2粒野之間既力仍然係純電力
咁樣？

係因為個時間澎脹，所以力唔一樣
但運動軌跡相同？

replies.msg:
https://physics.stackexchange.com/questions/188388/force-between-two-point-charges-moving-parallel-to-each-other
大家可以參考下呢個post
2粒charge都係constant velocity，即係inertial frame，即係應該同stationary見到嘅一樣 (special relativity其中一個postulate)
Stationary無magnetic force因為v=0, F=qv x B=0，所以淨係得Coulomb force
但2粒charge郁緊，stationary嘅observer就會見到dB/dt同dE/dt，即係會有額外嘅 (divergence of) E同B-field，而兩者嘅force應該會取消（嘗試計緊），所以最後stationary observer應該都只係會量度到Coulomb force，而且同喺charge嘅frame度到嘅係一樣

首先無光速觀察者呢樣野，如果個pair粒子係光速咁一齊行，對於所有觀察者佢地都係光速

其次，所有已知帶電粒子都有質量，無可能去到光速，所以一定係排斥。然後當你係佢地個rest frame睇既話electric force就同普通唔郁既帶電粒子一樣，即係可以就咁用Coulomb’s law計

但運動軌跡相同？

replies.msg:
Btw charge係可以被自己個field影響，qed嘅renormalisation就係講緊點喺qft解決self interaction嘅問題
太多數廢事詳解，簡單嚟講就係redefine electron mass同charge (coupling constant) 去absorb咗self interaction嘅contribution
Feynman份phd thesis就係assume charge唔可以self interact，但之後唔work所以放棄咗

當我無講過

不過真係最好用electromagnetic field既Lorentz transformation去諗
用F_mu nu計先係正解，其他轉哂做Lorentz scalar/vector/tensor一嘢車啲Lamda_mu nu落去搞掂

replies.msg: electromagnetic field咪即係F_{\mu\nu}

quote.msg:
F=qv x B唔係計relative velocity架咩
如果唔係observer自己郁咪發到電或者所有有charged component嘅bound state一飛就會爆開哂/痴埋一舊

唔好挑骨頭啦
呢個derivation淨係講緊current pair呢個case..
如果你得1個charged particle, 咁你點郁佢自己個B field 都唔會影響到佢自己.

Btw charge係可以被自己個field影響，qed嘅renormalisation就係講緊點喺qft解決self interaction嘅問題
太多數廢事詳解，簡單嚟講就係redefine electron mass同charge (coupling constant) 去absorb咗self interaction嘅contribution
Feynman份phd thesis就係assume charge唔可以self interact，但之後唔work所以放棄咗

replies.msg:
其實呢個係睇你用咩interpretation

如果你當每個Feynman diagram係真係 physical process既話，咁咪有self interaction

但如果純粹當Feynman diagram係表達個 perturbation series既工具，咁 self interaction就只係一個同physical process無關既名

我自己會用第二個諗法，因為Feynman diagramm只係對perturbation有用，但我覺得physics唔應該因為interaction strength而有唔同

replies.msg:
第三個諗法
Feynman diagram真係physical process 但係唔係電子既physical process 而係「元電子」既physical process 包括「元電子」既self interaction
電子 就定義做「元電子」同堆physical process既雜錦 所以啲physical process唔係電子既self interaction

利申 好攰 所以入黎troll下
